channel.title: Wont allow me to post on server status list
channel.description:
Im using wireless connection and wen i try to register my server, it says it offlines.
Whys this?

item.title: Wont allow me to post on server status list
item.dc:creator: @zane02 zane02
item.description:
@zane02 wrote:

well not really. If you post a server your not hosting then you must verifiy it. But if it doesnt say anything about you having to verifiy it or that the server is online. That means it isnt online.

Read full topic

item.title: Wont allow me to post on server status list
item.dc:creator: @zane02 zane02
item.description:
@zane02 wrote:

lol all servers can be entered on the status page so long as its 508 or 317… Also you must be on the computer hosting the server to place it up, or verify that its yours.

Read full topic

i think our server cant connect with the page. or some pages are stuk try again to portforward and change it
if dont work again then u did fail on the server status list.

item.title: Wont allow me to post on server status list
item.dc:creator: @zane02 zane02
item.description:
@zane02 wrote:

Mandood your server “isnt” online if you cant post it on the server status. Also you shouldnt listen to your friend because they donno what their talking about or they would help you lol. You probly need to portforward?

Hazy you probly didnt portforward either, or you didnt run the server at the time lol.

Read full topic

item.title: Wont allow me to post on server status list
item.dc:creator: @pkpoison pkpoison
item.description:
@pkpoison wrote:

Make sure your server is online and assessable… Have somebody test whether they can get on your server or not and if not that’s why.

Read full topic

item.title: Wont allow me to post on server status list
item.dc:creator: @mandood77 mandood77
item.description:
@mandood77 wrote:

this happens to me too, my friend says there are people coming on the server, but when i post it says it offline… Do i have to have the server on, on my computer?

Read full topic
item.source: Wont allow me to post on server status list

item.title: Wont allow me to post on server status list
item.dc:creator: @PKingKingScape PKingKingScape
item.description:
@PKingKingScape wrote:

Because your server is offline.
They try to connect to your server to make sure it is real (so you don’t spam)

It means that you havent got your server on, or you have done something wrong.

Read full topic
